channel.title: undefined - Dietrich Ayala
channel.description: Internet freedom, the web and Mozilla.

item.title: For the Amateur Astronomer...
item.description: "Free Star Charts I'm sitting here listening to Science Friday on NPR about amateur astronomy. I'm beginning to get the bug to try my own hand at getting a telescope and going out to see the stars and stuff. Childhood dreams and all that. Anyway here's a pretty cool site that has some free PDF star charts to assist your nighttime explorations. [via CogWorks News]Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala
